breakfast.title: Aalu Paratha

breakfast.title: Poha

dinner.title: Roti, Sabji, & Kheer
dinner.description: Soft roti served with seasonal vegetable curry and sweet kheer for dessert.

breakfast.description: Nutritious sattu paratha served with tangy chutney.
